remMethod.val: master(精通的) + mind(智力) → 才华横溢的人

trans.tranCn: 才华横溢的人，才子；出谋划策者
trans.tranOther: someone who plans and organizes a complicated operation, especially a criminal operation

trans.tranCn: 出谋划策； 幕后操纵
trans.tranOther: to think of, plan, and organize a large, important, and difficult operation
